profile:
Shower Restoration of Toronto is committed to delivering outstanding customer service. Not only does the owner meet directly with each client to provide a free estimate, but he also returns directly to the site to complete the work himself.

We're a small local family run business which began operations in the early 2000's in Toronto, Ontario where we completed extensive training in the marble restoration industry. Our first work experience was varied and included large scale commercial marble repairs. Our customers were so impressed with our service, that when it came time to refinish or restore their bathrooms, they naturally turned to us.

We pride ourselves in continuing to deliver outstanding results in shower renovations.

Providing exceptional customer service in our hallmark. We respond to every inquiry as though you are the only client.
payment_method: e-transfer, cash, cheque. All Card payments debit and credit
name: Shower Restoration Of Toronto

profile:
LUNAC Flooring is a family owned and operated business in Ontario. We specialize in tile, stone, ceramic, laminate, and vinyl floor installation. In addition, we provide service for bath, shower, backsplash and fireplace tile/stone installation. 

The primary contractor, Marko, has been in the business since 2018, however it wasn't until 2020 that he pursued this venture on his own. 

LUNAC Flooring offers top of the industry techniques and materials for all installations regardless of project size and/or complexity. We work with you to determine pricing that fits your budget, and our consultations are free of charge.

Our primary focus is to establish and maintain relationships built on transparency and superior workmanship. Come home to quality!

If this sounds like something that you've been looking for, connect with us, and allow us to bring your vision to life!
services:
Tile, stone, ceramic, vinyl and laminate floor installation.
Backsplash, shower, bath and fireplace tile/stone installation.
name: LUNAC Flooring
